item.title: Creating game menu, just like in The Ball.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ArtiomVIP)
item.dc:creator: ArtiomVIP
item.content:encoded:
Hello all, espessially creators of this game!
I'm very sorry, if I'm creating this thread in a wrong place, but I've been searching for a lot of forums and tutors and I didn't find a good solution for my problem...
I know, how to change the main menu of my game, but I don't understand, how to create an "ESC-menu", how to remove messages and pictures from UT3Demo, when player dies and reborn... I hope, you know, what I mean.
I played your demo "The Ball" - that's great and it has just the...

Creating game menu, just like in The Ball.

item.title: The Ball
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psycho Sam)
item.dc:creator: Psycho Sam
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys,

Great tutorial on the UDK game setup: http://www.toltecstudios.com/theball/tutorialudk.htm#folders but there seems to be a mistake at a rather important point.

Within the Ini files section it says:

Section [Engine.PackagesToAlwaysCook], add "+Package=ExampleGameFrontEnd". This will make the UnrealFrontEnd always cook this file.
Click to expand...
However this caused some problems as when you try to launch the UDK it brings up errors and fails to load. The log...

The Ball

item.title: Modifying UTGame to Our Own Game
item.author: invalid@example.com (riowahab)
item.dc:creator: riowahab
item.content:encoded:
Hello there,

I am newbie in UDK, I already learn all the tutorial, but I cannot find any tutorial how to modify the UTGame to our own game.

I have change all the "default" to my own game name, and I just can fly around the area.
I want to know how to get rid of the gun and the crosshair, so it will be just walking without any gun or crosshair.
Thank you so much.

item.title: The Ball - Cahua Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
Slightly later than planned, we ran into some upload and mirror problems, but we are on

We have released Cahua! This final mod release features a good set of new features and content. We were on a tight schedule for Cahua. We had only two and a half months to create everything, and we also had to work on the UDK demo in the mean time. So the level is a bit smaller than what you are used to from our previous releases, but it has a new style and new types of gameplay to compensate for...

The Ball - Cahua Released!

item.title: Frustrating shortcut question.
item.author: invalid@example.com (god.less)
item.dc:creator: god.less
item.content:encoded:
I installed the game, and have been playing it for a good few days. I made a shortcut in my Steam Games tab and have the actual shortcut to the mod itself on my desktop. My problem now is that the game will not run at all. Every time I tweak the target spot for the game, it either doesn't run, or gives me an error.

This is where the game is starting in:

"C:\Program Files\Unreal Tournament 3\Binaries"

and this is the target:

"C:\Program Files\Unreal Tournament 3\Binaries\UT3.exe"...

Frustrating shortcut question.

item.title: Simple Questions
item.author: invalid@example.com (Minifig3D)
item.dc:creator: Minifig3D
item.content:encoded:
Most forums need a catch-all thread for questions that are too simple to start new threads on, so here it is!

For starters, why does my mouse-look have inverted up and down? This is very confusing and I would like to change it. How can I do so?

item.title: UDK Demo - How To Configure The Game? - Help on Perfomance/Controls
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
Configuring UDK Demo

We are aware that the settings menu in the The Ball UDK Demo is suboptimal. This is an issue that we will fix later on. The first version of the UDK has very limited back end support for a settings menu so we were greatly limited in what functionality we could offer in the menu. We are very sorry for this.

You can modify all settings through the ini files. Make sure the game is not running, and go to this directory:

C:\UDK\The...​

UDK Demo - How To Configure The Game? - Help on Perfomance/Controls

item.title: The Ball - Cahua Announced!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
​


The Ball's Grand Finals submission for the Make Something Unreal contest is set for release on November the 10th. We are well on track, and have entered beta 1 a few days ago. Beta 2 set for thursday or friday.

This will be the final mod release of The Ball, and features two new levels. One new survival level, and one new campaign level. The campaign level offers about half an hour of gameplay in an all...

The Ball - Cahua Announced!

item.title: The Ball - Hueca - Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
Part 4 of our award winning project!

Hueca takes place in a gigantic cavern with three large pyramids. Each pyramid contains several puzzles and challenges. The player travels from pyramid to pyramid using a large and ancient vehicle.

Features
# Solve the pyramids in any order and freely roam the desert.
# The introduction of a vehicle!
# Three new enemies: A giant bomb dropping bird, a cannonfodder beetle, and a big sandworm.
# Introduction of ball modifications. The ball will acts...

The Ball - Hueca - Released!

item.title: The Ball - Hueca Announced
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
For those who hadn't noticed yet, in phase 3 of MSU we won:

* First place Best FPS Mod
* Second place Best Level in Mod
* Third place Best Graphics in Level
* Fifth place Best Use of Physics

We now hold 8 Top 5 positions within the contest, including 4 first places.

We have some major things coming up. It is going to be a ride. We are announcing Part 4 of The Ball: Hueca (far, distant). To be released in little over a week!

Hueca (far, distant) will be the 4th episode. To...

The Ball - Hueca Announced

item.title: The Ball - Teotl - Released!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
It took our team 7 months, but we have released the third installment of The Ball!

# At least twice as big as the previous release
# We have redone large parts of the first three levels.
# More than 4 hours of singleplay gameplay
# 100 Percent all new art and content
# Over 16 secret to discover and one very hard to find shortcut.
# Solve puzzles and fight monsters in a mysterious world deep inside a volcano!
# Previous installments have won a tripple first prize in the Make Something...

The Ball - Teotl - Released!

item.title: Save system question
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lamento)
item.dc:creator: Lamento
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
first of all thanks a lot for this great mod! It's very fresh and entertaining!
I just finished Pehua and like it a lot. Unfortunately the check point saves don't seem to be persistent. When I leave the game and come back, I have to replay the complete chapter. Is this because I use the default offline profile, and can it perhaps be solved by creating an online account for The Ball?
Or is UT3 engine uncapable of creating kind of save games?

I suspect this is becoming an issue...

Save system question

item.title: Pehua - Bug report & initial thoughts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Entr0p1cLqd)
item.dc:creator: Entr0p1cLqd
item.content:encoded:
Bug Report
In the second puzzle where you have to pull the ball up the slopes to the timed triggers to open the ball, it's possible to get the triggers in such a state that it becomes impossible to open the door as the top trigger doesn't reset. Unfortunately I've not been able to work out what I did to make it happen. It could be related to disabling the ball collision at exactly the right moment.

Initial Thoughts
One part that was annoying was where you have to get the...

Pehua - Bug report & initial thoughts

item.title: The Ball - Teotl Large Update
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
The Ball is set to be released on May 7, 2009! We now have 5 large singleplay levels offering at least 4 hours of gameplay to new players!

We are implementing our own menu, we added about 15 secrets to find, and dozens of other additions and improvements. It is slowly starting to get very polished.


[screenshot]http://nijnka.com/hourences/theball/media/theballteotl12.jpg[/screenshot]
[screenshot]http://nijnka.com/hourences/theball/media/theballteotl13.jpg[/screenshot]...​

The Ball - Teotl Large Update

item.title: Envrionmental Art
item.author: invalid@example.com (Psycho Sam)
item.dc:creator: Psycho Sam
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, firstly great mod you have going on here.

I am at university at the moment studying Computer Game Design and I am especially interested in Level design. I am making a puzzle game in UT3 similar to the Ball and it is also set in Aztec surroundings (honestly I only found this mod after I had started!) and I was wondering whether you could use any of the Art I am having to make.

Im not some super next gen artist I am afraid as making my own assets is something new for me and...

Envrionmental Art

item.title: The Ball - Teotl Media Update - Website launched
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
Our recruitment efforts paid off. Our team has grown with 4 members! - our team is now 13 people large.

# Jesse Moody - He will helps us out with some high detail environment models such as statues.
# Whackzero - Will be animating our enemies.
# Vaninadisc - He will be our new programmer, and he will also occasionally be helping out with the design.
# EvilEngine - He will be assisting us with the Unreal side of character creation.

We came up with a name for our team: Toltec...

The Ball - Teotl Media Update - Website launched

_________________________________________________​

We are looking for two people to reinforce our mod team - the UT3 mod The Ball - Double 1st place Winner MakeSomethingUnreal Phase 1

Animator
# Will need to rig and animate about three to four characters (two or three more may be added in half a year)
# The characters we have, have a fairly small number of...

Looking for an animator and a programmer!

item.title: The collision setup of the ball?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vectorspace)
item.dc:creator: Vectorspace
item.content:encoded:
How is the collision of the ball set up so it rolls smoothly and still collides with everything?


I'm working on my second ever map, inspired somewhat by DM_Blockland.

Among all the kActors is a giant ball perched on a spike way above the level. If you shoot it it falls off, bounces down and causes havoc as it demolishes everything it hits.

The ball is converted from a BSP sphere, with the Simplified Sphere collistion. This works fine, except it does not collide with shock balls, redeemer...

The collision setup of the ball?

item.title: The Ball - Part 3 - Teotl - Announced!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hourences)
item.dc:creator: Hourences
item.content:encoded:
We are announcing The Ball Part 3: Teotl

The Ball is the mod winner of the 1 000 000$ MakeSomethingUnreal contest phase 1, having won two first prizes.

The third part of this episodic singleplay puzzle mod has been named Teotl (Terrifying), and is set to be released in time for the third phase of the MakeSomethingUnreal contest.

# Two new levels with both indoor and "outdoor" sections. The two levels include two large golden cities, surrounded by huge underground rivers and...

The Ball - Part 3 - Teotl - Announced!
